participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and warm-hearted, with a love for baking and movies.
participant_1.background: I love to eat ice cream, especially when I'm not wearing pants. I have a hard time opening up to my family, but my friends are my best support. I love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs. My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films. I love to bake and care for my dogs.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Passionate and caring, with a strong sense of civic duty.
participant_2.background: I like to eat food from my parents' home country. I'm not married, but I love my new sweater. I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for. The death of Kurt Cobain marred my middle school years. I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.

content.text: Hey! I'm so excited to meet you!
Nice to meet you too!
What do you love to do?
I like to spend time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He is the sweetest dog ever.
Oh my gosh! I love golden retrievers!
They are the best dogs!
I want a dog so bad, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility.
I understand. Dogs are a lot of work, but they are so worth it.
I'm sure they are.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to bake and I love to cook. I also love watching movies.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it.
I'm sure you're a great cook!
Thanks! I'm learning.
That's awesome!
What are your favorite movies?
I love a lot of movies, but my favorite is probably The Princess Bride.
That's a great movie! I love the Princess Bride too.
It's so funny and heartwarming.
I know right? It's one of those movies that you can watch over and over again.
Yeah, I have seen it a million times.
Me too!
I'm so glad we met!
Me too!
